unsuppurted_env_desc: You have an unsupported environment installed. Please use one of these environments: {}.
summary: Save the current configuration of your desktop environment
description: SaveDesktop lets you save your current configuration (themes, icons, wallpapers, all desktop environment settings, extensions, etc.) with one click.
filename_spaces_msg: There must be no spaces in the file name
unable_find_file: Unable to find the file, please drag file from Downloads directory
periodic_saving_desc: Changes will only take effect after the next login
import_from_list_error: No configuration was found in the SaveDesktop directory.
import_config_desc: Import the configuration using drag and drop, from a file or from a list.
